00037 class Color {
00038   public:
00040     static const uint32_t BLACK       = 0xFF000000;
00042     static const uint32_t DKGRAY      = 0xFF444444;
00044     static const uint32_t GRAY        = 0xFF888888;
00046     static const uint32_t LTGRAY      = 0xFFCCCCCC;

00068     Color();
00069

00072 
00073     virtual ~Color();
00074 
00079     static inline uint32_t alpha(uint32_t color) {
00080         return color >> 24;
00081     }
00082 
00087     static inline uint32_t red(uint32_t color) {
00088         return (color >> 16) & 0xFF;
00089     }
00090 
00095     static inline uint32_t green(uint32_t color) {
00096         return (color >> 8) & 0xFF;
00097     }
00098 
00103     static inline uint32_t blue(uint32_t color) {
00104         return color & 0xFF;
00105     }
00106 
00117     static inline uint32_t rgb(uint red, uint green, uint blue) {
00118         return (0xFF << 24) | (red << 16) | (green << 8) | blue;
00119     }
00120 
00131     static inline uint32_t argb(uint alpha, uint red, uint green, uint blue) {
00132         return (alpha << 24) | (red << 16) | (green << 8) | blue;
00133     }
00134

00144     static uint32_t parseColor(const base::String& colorString);
00145

00157                          gaia::base::Array<float>* hsv);
00158 
00167     static void colorToHSV(uint32_t color, gaia::base::Array<float>* hsv);
00168 
00178     static inline uint32_t HSVToColor(const gaia::base::Array<float>& hsv) {
00179         return HSVToColor((uint)0xFF, hsv);
00180     }
